name: Dodge the fireworks!
description:
Contains flashing lights.
WASD to move.

Esc to exit.

Dodge the fireworks.

Used sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/bmlake/sounds/251619/

https://freesound.org/people/Andy_Gardner/sounds/367485/

[Experiemental]:

  • Press "m" to make the explosions actually destroy the environment, please only use this on the linux / windows versions, as your web browser has performance issues with this enabled.
